name: Musicademy
tagline: A table of contents for the music industry
body:
# Engineering Resources

## Categories

### Textbooks
[Modern Recording Techniques (8th Edition) – _David Miles Huber & Robert E. Runstein_](https://www.amazon.com/Recording-Techniques-Engineering-Society-Presents/dp/0240821572/ref=sr_1_1?ie=UTF8&qid=1481096170&sr=8-1&keywords=modern+recording+techniques)

[Understanding and Crafting the Mix: The Art of Recording (3rd Edition) – _William Moylan_](https://www.amazon.com/Understanding-Crafting-Mix-Art-Recording/dp/0415842816/ref=sr_1_1?ie=UTF8&qid=1481096439&sr=8-1&keywords=understanding+and+crafting+the+mix)

[The Mixing Engineer's Handbook (3rd Edition) – _Bobby Owsinski_](https://www.amazon.com/Mixing-Engineers-Handbook-Bobby-Owsinski/dp/128542087X/ref=sr_1_1?ie=UTF8&qid=1481096502&sr=8-1&keywords=bobby+owsinski+mixing)

[Assistant Engineers Handbook (2nd Edition) – _Tim Crich_](https://www.amazon.com/Assistant-Engineers-Handbook-Tim-Crich/dp/0969822332/ref=sr_1_1?s=books&ie=UTF8&qid=1481097002&sr=1-1&keywords=assistant+engineers+handbook)

[The Sound Reinforcement Handbook (2nd Edition) – _Gary Davis & Ralph Jones_](https://www.amazon.com/Sound-Reinforcement-Handbook-Gary-Davis/dp/0881889008)

[The Recording Engineer’s Handbook (3rd Edition – _Bobby Owsinski_](https://www.amazon.com/Recording-Engineers-Handbook-Bobby-Owsinski/dp/1285442016/ref=sr_1_1?ie=UTF8&qid=1481096660&sr=8-1&keywords=recording+engineers+handbook)

[Mixing with your Mind – _Michael Paul Stavrou (Author), Sir George Martin (Foreword)_](http://www.mixingwithyourmind.com/book.php)

[Understanding Audio: Getting the Most Out of Your Project or Professional Recording Studio – _Daniel M. Thompson_](https://www.amazon.com/Understanding-Audio-Getting-Professional-Recording/dp/0634009591)

[Mastering Audio: The Art and the Science (3rd Edition) – _Bob Katz_](https://www.amazon.com/Mastering-Audio-Science-Bob-Katz/dp/0240818962/ref=sr_1_1?ie=UTF8&qid=1481096603&sr=8-1&keywords=mastering+audio+the+art+and+the+science)

[The Craft of Controlling Sound: A Walk in the Acoustic, Analog, and Digital Worlds – _Stephen Solum_](https://www.amazon.com/The-Craft-Controlling-Sound-Acoustic/dp/141162713X)


### Software Tutorials
[ProTools Basics Tutorials (YouTube Playlist](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=InY5M_TPgnY&list=PLl8ReMyNs-kHACLB66S8iFXURybKma6gH)

[Logic Pro X Video Tutorial Series (YouTube Playlist)](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=hU5XhG5Ywbk&list=PLXmi76euGSyzX8KMPAHJPyOSZy5w4CsV9)

[Software Compressors: An overview (Youtube Playlist)](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=DzoKQnjYP1I)

[DiGiGrid SoundGrid Studio System Demonstration](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=n-Vf0mbSEyQ&t=174s)

[Pop vocal processing with waves plugins (Youtube Playlist)](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Cke5PdCW3Nk&list=RDCke5PdCW3Nk)

[Kick & Bass excitment Using Fabfilter Saturn And Some EQ](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=VeXiwgh5iMw)

[Into The lair #1 to #115 (Dave Pensado Mixing Tips & Tricks](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=jofMNLoyUZs&list=PLnQKNq5KeUpEaWVlGAt6_foiLW_zyyH-n)

[Logic Pro X - Video Tutorial 23 - Flex Pitch and Vocal Tuning](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=z8tqojYN6TQ&t=81s)

[How To Auto Tune Vocals and Pro Tools Melodyne Like a Semi-Pro](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=cY0F8t9yVow)

[Mixing - Using VocAlign on Hooks](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=EXT_WSUACy8)

[Mixing 808s for Punch and Clarity on Small Speakers](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=f_9_LTaUqaU)


### Miscellaneous Resources

[reddit.com/r/audioengineering](https://reddit.com/r/audioengineering)
